help.purpose.title: ðŸ§­ What is CBM GRC Matcher for?
help.purpose.text: CBM GRC Matcher is a product analysis and matching tool based on various keys (manufacturer, internal and external references). It allows grouping, filtering and comparing products by quality, CRN group, and sales or stock history.

help.grouping.title: ðŸ§© Understanding grouping_crn
help.grouping.text1: The grouping_crn field is a logical key that links multiple CBM products (cod_pro) together, even if they don't directly share the same ref_crn, as long as they are connected via transitive links.
help.grouping.text2: Example: product A is linked to ref_crn X, product B to X and Y, and product C to Y â†’ A, B and C are grouped under the same grouping_crn.
help.grouping.text3: This grouping is automatically computed from Bridge_cod_pro_ref_crn and propagated into Grouping_crn_table (with quality, refint, and ref_ext included).
